1128220.name: ZAAM
1128220.description:
Description:

Embark on a bone-chilling journey and step into the unknown with ZAAM. This mind-bending first-person psychological thriller will grip you from the very start, leaving you questioning your own reality. You'll be thrust into the shoes of a father desperate to find his missing daughter, Lucy. But as you unravel their complex relationship, prepare yourself for an emotional rollercoaster that will leave you breathless.

The surreal and fully interactive world of ZAAM is both beautiful and terrifying, inspired by the spine-tingling works of John Carpenter and David Cronenberg. With a dark and eerie atmosphere that complements the story perfectly, this game will keep you on the edge of your seat as you make choices that determine the course of Lucy's fate.



For fans of Gone Home and Layers of Fear, ZAAM is an absolute must-play. The intimate and dreamlike story will tug at your heartstrings, while the fully physical interactive environments will make you feel like you're living the story in real-time. But beware, the light puzzle-solving elements will keep your mind engaged as you try to uncover the truth.

Experience the gripping tale in just about an hour and a half, but don't be fooled by the short playtime. ZAAM is a game that will stay with you long after the final credits roll. If you're ready to challenge your senses and test your limits, then enter the realm of ZAAM and see if you have what it takes to uncover the truth. Are you ready to face your fears?



Key Features:
  • Intense and Emotional Story: The game features an intimate and surreal story that delves into the complex relationship between a father and his missing daughter.

  • Interactive Environments: Explore the unsettling story of Lucy's complicated relationship with her father, as you search for her in ZAAM's chilling world. Use your powers of observation to unravel the truth behind her disappearance.

  • Dark and Eerie Atmosphere: Inspired by the works of John Carpenter and David Cronenberg, ZAAM features a spine-tingling atmosphere that complements the story perfectly, keeping you on the edge of your seat.

  • Puzzle-Solving Elements: You will be challenged by light but intriguing puzzles as they unravel the truth behind Lucy's disappearance.

  • Short Playtime with a Lasting Impact: Experience the gripping tale of ZAAM in just about an hour and a half, and be prepared for an emotional rollercoaster ride that will leave a lasting impact on you.
1128220.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙
*具有完全音频支持的语言
